defs.text: This demonstrates a simple animation of the transmission of temperature from the air into the ground. Heat is conductedfrom the air into the ground and diffuses downward. As theheat diffuses downwards, the amplitude of the wave decreasesuntil at some depth there is no perceptible variation over thetime period being examined.The simulation can be started, paused, stopped and restarted with the buttons below.
Created with LiveMotion by Ric Wright.
